data.text: @danspena You & You Alone are "Called" to wage war for each of them. The Good Lord didn't put His Spirit within you not to fight for them, but to RISE UP, in HS STRENGTH to fulfill YOUR CALLING. There is NO FEAR in YOU because YOU HAVE THE POWER of the LORD within you. He's told me so.

@danspena Until this core issue is addressed, all the words of Wisdom and Understanding are falling on bad soil incapable of producing a harvest, no matter how loud you speak. If your "True Calling" is to help them succeed, ("IT IS") then this is the barrier battling against your Calling.

@danspena Dan, young men R battling the spirit of jezebel and other demonic forces which have taken domicile within them. These demonic indwellers have taken possession within, thus robbing them of what GOD desires for their lives. So, the first order of business is in "setting them free"
